tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.3.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: Gypsy Eyes
programme.desc: Unable to lose the pursuing Russian fighters, Harm's and Mac’s hijacked Mig is shot out of the sky over Siberia.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Act of Terror
programme.desc: When Arab terrorists attach a mine to a US Navy warship in an attempt to sink it, Marine guards are able to kill one and capture the other, even after the mine explodes, killing two sailors.(n)

programme.title: JAG: The Black Jet
programme.desc: Harm and Mac are sent to Teheran, Iran to represent a Navy flier whose Stealth jet crashed in Iran due to a major mechanical failure.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Silent Service
programme.desc: Mac and Harm are having trouble relating...a result of working together under stress for so long.(n)

programme.title: JAG: King of the Greenie Board
programme.desc: Harm is now a Tomcat division commander aboard the carrier USS Patrick Henry that is patrolling the Mediterranean near Yugoslavia.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Queen Scary
programme.desc: At Halloween, Team Scorpion takes on a case to prove the existence of ghosts on the Queen Mary but find an all-too-real disaster when they locate a 'ghost ship' on a deadly collision course.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Go With the Florence
programme.desc: While tracking a device that can prevent a nuclear meltdown through the Los Angeles sewers, Walter learns the nuances of listening and not offering advice to Paige.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Faire is Foul
programme.desc: For Sylvester's birthday, Team Scorpion visits a renaissance festival, but the revelry is cut short when a group tries to rob a nearby police evidence locker.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: It's Raining Men (Of War)
programme.desc: On Thanksgiving, Team Scorpion's new neighbor, Florence \, joins them at sea on a mission to destroy a floating island of trash, but her flawed contribution leaves her, Walter and Happy stranded on the quickly dissolving island.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Crime Every Mountain
programme.desc: As Cabe's trial looms over Team Scorpion, a simple case goes sideways when they help a father and his daughter whose plane crashes nearby.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Who Let the Dog Out ('Cause Now It's Stuck in a Cistern)
programme.sub-title: Who Let the Dog Out ('Cause Now It's Stuck in a Cistern)
programme.desc: As Team Scorpion anxiously awaits the verdict of Cabe's trial which could send him to prison, they focus their nervous energy on trying to save a dog stuck in a cistern.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Home Run
programme.desc: After a community-outreach baseball game erupts in a drive-by shooting, Gail’s relationship with her brother is put to the test . Meanwhile, Swarek plans a getaway with Andy up to Oliver’s cabin, which goes off the rails in every possible way.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Best Man
programme.desc: Andy and Sam are shocked to learn that Oliver is the prime suspect in IA’s corruption investigation into 15 Division. They only have until end of day today to find Chris Klem – the missing explosives-dealer – and clear Oliver’s name.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Integrity Test
programme.desc: With Oliver still the prime suspect in the bombing of 15’s evidence room, Andy, Dov, Gail, and Nick undertake a risky – and potentially career-ending – plan to prove that Commissioner Alonso Santana is corrupt.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Ninety Degrees
programme.desc: Andy heads out with a very-pregnant Marlo to find a volatile woman who’s gone missing after group therapy, but neither Andy nor Marlo are prepared when Marlo suddenly goes into labor.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Breaking Up the Band
programme.desc: Now that Sam and Marlo’s baby girl has arrived (Ep. 520), it’s clear nothing could have prepared Andy for this moment. So when Juliet offers Andy an opportunity to leave town for 4 months on an undercover project, Andy starts to consider it.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: The Tivoli Venue
programme.desc: A well-known venue for accomplished as well as up and coming bands The Tivoli Venue boasts many a ghost. In this episode one of the team gets a warning from the other side that reduces them to tears and something seems to be stalking the team.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Wentworth Woodhouse Part 1
programme.desc: Part 1. The upper floors of Wentworth House are a maze of corridors and rooms and the team have one night to investigate as many as possible. With one whistling spirit, groans and loud noises the team are shaken to their core.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Wentworth Woodhouse Part 2
programme.desc: Part 2. The underbelly of this great house is a sharp contrast to its upper grandeur. Some members of the team are forced to run while other are lost in the labyrinth of tunnels and passageways pursued by something unnatural.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: 30 East Drive_PT1
programme.desc: 30 East Drive is said to house the most violent poltergeist in the world. The team go head first into what becomes their toughest challenge yet. As soon as they enter the property something is waiting and wants to be known.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: 30 East Drive_PT2
programme.desc: The team continue their most threatening investigation yet and for some they will be scared for life mentally and physically. The most violent poltergeist in the world is ready for a fight...but who wins?(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Higher Dead/ucation
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Bowling Green, Kentucky to investigate Western Kentucky University's three stories of death and terrifying paranormal activity.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 10
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Fort Ticonderoga
programme.desc: Fort Ticonderoga,located in upstate New York,is being haunted by the dead from three nationsand needs help from the TAPS team.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Ghost Mission
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to San Juan Capistrano, California to investigate the San Juan Capistrano Mission.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Deep Midnight's Voice
programme.desc: While caught in a battle between two Nietzschean prides, the crew captures a hostile who claims that his pride possesses a map of the slipstream.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Illusion of Majesty
programme.desc: A wrong turn after exiting a slipstream sends the Andromeda into the Prolon system. They rescue an escape pod from certain disaster, but the pride wants it back.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Twilight of the Idols
programme.desc: The crew seeks for a lost colony of Nietzscheans and discovers another crew that has been secretly helping them.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Day of Judgement, Day of Wrath
programme.sub-title: Day of Judgement, Day of Wrath
programme.desc: The crew installs a new AI in a new Commonwealth battleship, and naturally things don't go as they should.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Shadows Cast by a Final Salute
programme.sub-title: Shadows Cast by a Final Salute
programme.desc: Tyr convinces the Nietzscheans that he is the reincarnation of Drago Museveni.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.sub-title: Answers Given to Questions Never Asked
programme.desc: A message from a collector sends Dylan on a quest to rescue a hostage and find the remains of the Commonwealth fleet.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.9
programme.desc: An Escalade rental for a group of partying teenagers ends in a lawsuit between a limo company and a frustrated mother who claims she was lied to by the owner.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.184
programme.desc: Special laundry privileges after a divorce, followed by alleged\t\t\t\r\nstalking and assault charges, leave an ex-husband very angry about\t\t\t\r\nbeing arrested; he sues his ex for damages.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.75
programme.desc: Young man admits to being drunk and possessing marijuana but denies throwing rock through woman's window. Man cares for injured mother after father's death; fight over credit card debt and estate divides them.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.252
programme.desc: Attending a golf tournament becomes a source of contention between ex-lovers when payment for a plane ticket is challenged. When students move out of a shared apartment, their parents are left to fight over rent and damaged credit.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.209
programme.desc:
A woman’s Chihuahua is killed by her neighbor’s larger dogs; she			
sues for damages.			
A teenager accuses her ex-boyfriend of trashing her New Year’s			
Eve party hotel room; she claims he was hitting on another woman.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.116
programme.desc: Claiming a female client was smoking marijuana, a personal trainer is sued by her father for allegedly skipping out on her sessions/A man allegedly locks his roommate out instead of properly evicting him after a dispute over bills.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.227
programme.desc: A lease agreement scrutiny challenges a woman's right to sue ex-tenants for property damage during a fight. A woman sues a former co-worker for loans to bail him out of jail and pay bills.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.81
programme.desc: Woman claims assault while trying to retrieve Glock 23 bought for boyfriend; ex-lover says gun was gift. Children accused of crashing into neighbor's parked vehicle while riding bikes in street.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.108
programme.desc: Woman accuses ex-boyfriend of coercing money and housing with suicide threats/Teens dispute sale of stolen car in hit-and-run.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.97
programme.desc: A woman accuses her ex-roommate-to-be of stealing her security deposit; she is countersued for rent and money owed/A 21st birthday celebration ends with a young woman allegedly wrapping a borrowed car around a pole.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.240
programme.desc: A scam with online surveys causes a rift between a father and son over a fraudulent check. A woman, after her house burns down, has conflicts with her daughter's boyfriend's family over a wreck and unpaid rent.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The cheerleaders and members of the marching band from the University of Southern California have their lunch prepared by the remaining contestants.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The next challenge has an element of the unknown to it, as the contestants must create dishes using ingredients chosen by the roll of a die.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The contestants must use the ingredients which can be found written on a selection of pigs' collars. First though, they must catch the pigs.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Five classic sauces: hollandaise, bechamel, demi-glace, veloute and tomato, must be the basis of the contestants dishes in this challenge.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Putting a twist on the original dishes eaten by a happy couple on their wedding day fifty years ago is the challenge for the remaining contestants.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Jose Mas, the CEO of MasTec, one of the largest builders of telecommunication and energy systems in North America, poses as a recently laid off high school basketball coach, getting a second chance at starting a new career.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Lisa Lisson, the first female president of FedEx Express Canada, goes undercover to find out if her employees have the right resources to provide exceptional service in the fiercely competitive courier industry.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Boss Terry Davis has been with Home Hardware Stores for 42 years. He worked his way up to the top – now he’s returning to the shop floors and factories to turn flaws into fixes.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Kristen Flynn, the boss of Premiere Van Lines. She’s a woman with a formidable reputation. Her own staff call her “Frugal Flynn” because she watches the pennies to protect profit.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Tervita specializes in environmental clean-up for Western Canada’s booming energy and mining industries. It doesn’t take long for Fory Musser,.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Surrogate
programme.desc: An overly enthusiastic Audrey pushes it too far with a surrogate mother who she and Jeff are considering paying to have their baby. Meanwhile, Russell shamelessly pokes fun at Jennifer and Adam's wedding Web site.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: They Do?
programme.desc: Adam and Jennifer plan a secret wedding; however, a series of unfortunate events puts their plan in jeopardy. Meanwhile, to keep Russell and Timmy from finding out about the ceremony, Adam tells them he is staging an intervention for Jeff.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Rug-of-War
programme.desc: Upset that he'll have to purchase a new rug after Audrey gives their old one to Adam and Jenn, Jeff tries to sabotage the gift by telling Adam about all the 'fun' that he and Audrey had on it.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Bank
programme.desc: When Jeff screws up paying for Audrey's Pilates classes, he reveals to Adam that he has a 'Bank' of mistakes that she has incurred that he uses to ease her anger. Russell sends an email to Timmy's crush.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Surro-Gate
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey discover surprising news about their surrogate.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Handy Man
programme.desc: When Audrey realizes Jeff is getting a bit bored in the bedroom, she tries to spice it up. Russell gets called out on a business trip, but has a fear of flying. He invites Timmy to distract him.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Play Ball
programme.desc: Audrey considers quitting her job when she realizes it's making her life miserable. Although things are heated between Allison and Timmy, she wants to put their sex life aside so they can spend time getting to know each other.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Baked
programme.desc: Audrey embarks on a new start after quitting her demanding job; however, her time at home makes her stir crazy, prompting her to start a cookie business. Timmy is getting advice from the guys who encourage him to be more of a dude than a gentleman.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Les-Bro
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey embark on finding a surrogate mother, only to run into problems with the interviewing process. Russell's wealthy mother comes to town, and he reluctantly decides to have her stop paying his rent.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Mannequin Head Ball
programme.desc: Stuck with a store Jeff leased for Audrey's fleeting cookie shop, he and Adam stay behind to clean up and discover a new game using the heads of mannequins.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bait and Switch
programme.desc: Things are seldom what they seem in the world of bounty hunting. When the fugitive's girlfriend offers to help Dog trap this dangerous felon, Dog knows that someone is being deceived. The only question is, whom?(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: True Identity
programme.desc: Dog knows that looks can be deceiving. The fugitive is pretty, petite, and trouble. She stands accused of settling an argument with the help of a box cutter. What Dog does not anticipate is how deceptive this femme fatale can truly be!(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Secrets and Lies
programme.desc: What do you do when you have a fugitive you not only want to find, but believe can be helped back onto the straight and narrow? If you're Mary Ellen you call your good friend Dog.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Match Point
programme.desc: Duty calls and the Chapmans are off on a hunt. The team chases a fugitive who has disappeared into a world of "no known addresses.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Menehune Mischief
programme.desc: When Beth returns to the compound on the Big Island she finds a damaged SUV and two possible culprits - Dog or Justin. Pressed by Beth, Dog offers a third option. The perpetrators are Hawaii's mythical mischief makers - the Menehune!(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mister Mom
programme.desc: It's been quite a while since Tim Chapman put down his mace can and bulletproof vest to care for his growing family. When his old friend Dog calls asking for help tracking an elusive felon, Tim jumps into action.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bait & Snitch
programme.desc: With the aid of the runner's girlfriend the posse heads out to bring a client with a checked past in. Little does the team suspect that before the end of the day Dog will be helping to mend a family torn apart by violence.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Scared Straight
programme.desc: Dog tracks a fugitive who is on the run from the law for the first time. Reading the file Dog knows the young man's life is at the crossroads. Will he be able to track down this wanna-be-gangsta in time to convince him to make the right choice?(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: All My Children
programme.desc: For a guy who started life as a free spirited outlaw-biker Dog has certainly turned into a family man. His children touch everything he does today, from searching for the perfect gift for his daughter Cecily's birthday to hunting a fugitive.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Toad to Perdition
programme.desc: When Willie and his brothers spend too much time frog hunting, their wives challenge them to a "frogging" competition.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: RV There Yet?
programme.desc: The Robertson family takes a road trip to Liberty University where they will drop off John Luke and Mary Kate for their first year of college. Along the way, they stop in Nashville to visit Willie's friend Colt Ford.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Willie & Korie's Anniversorry
programme.desc: The Robertson family throws a party for Willie & Korie's 25th anniversary, but things take a dramatic turn when Willie and Korie reveal a big secret. Meanwhile, when Jase blames Uncle Si for getting him a parking ticket.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Statue of Imitations
programme.desc: When Willie asks a local chainsaw artist to make him a statue, he gets a big surprise when it's revealed that the statue is of an unlikely subject - Willie himself. Meanwhile, Jep and Jessica attempt to help Kay with her hoarding.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: A Decent Proposal
programme.desc: On a trip to New York, Jase's son Reed proposes to his girlfriend, which inspires his father to fan the flames of romance back home with Missy. Meanwhile, Sadie asks Willie to be a guest lecturer at her business class.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Father Knows Pest
programme.desc: The tables are turned when the HOA comes to Jase for help to rid the neighborhood of a menacing beaver. Little Will has just gotten his learner's permit, and Willie and Si argue over which of them is the better driving instructor.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Wild Wild West Monroe
programme.desc: When Jase and Jep get into an argument over which of them is the rightful heir to their grandfather's old rifle, they decide to settle the argument with a marksmanship contest. Meanwhile, Willie and Korie help Rebecca prepare for her trip to Taiwan.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Half in the Bag
programme.desc: After Si has started moonlighting as a grocery bagger, the guys show up at the store and their teasing inadvertently causes Si to lose his job and his chance to enter a local bagging competition.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: There Will Be Flood
programme.desc: When a large storm hits Monroe, most of the adults head to Phil and Kay's to help protect their house from flooding while Jess, Sadie, Rebecca and Cole babysit the kids. Meanwhile, Jep, Si, Martin and Godwin try to protect the Duck Commander.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Bingo Star
programme.desc: Willie accompanies Kay to a local bingo tournament and gets seduced by the game, eventually embarrassing himself and Kay with his enthusiasm.(n)

programme.title: Rise Of The Fellowship
programme.desc: What if The Lord of the Rings wasn’t just a story? What if it happened to you? Randall Dooley and his friends are outcasts at school, spending most of their time playing online games. After Randall is set up for a crime he didn’t commit.(n)

programme.title: Area Q
programme.desc: After his son disappears a journalist goes to Brazil to investigate, where he discovers close encounter sightings that have taken place in a region known as Area Q, where he may uncover the mystery surrounding his son's disappearance.(n)

programme.title: Avengers Grimm: Time Wars
programme.desc: An Evil Queen enlists Rumpelstiltskin to help her send the Avengers Grimm back in time. The Avengers will need to work together if they are to return to the present and thwart the Queen before she can carry out her evil plan.(n)

programme.title: Warrior
programme.desc: WARRIOR tells the moving and inspirational story of the Conlon family, Brendan (Joel Edgerton), Tommy (Tom Hardy) and Paddy (Nick Nolte), who find redemption in the ring as they fight to repair themselves and their family.(n)

programme.title: The Arrival
programme.desc: Radio astronomer Zane Zaminsky believes he has picked up a cosmic noise that signals extraterrestrial intelligence. His desperate search for answers leads him to discover that aliens are already on Earth and in the process of preparing to take it over.(n)

programme.title: She's Funny That Way
programme.desc: A married Broadway director falls for a call-girl-turned-actress and works to help her advance her career, but things get a little more complicated than they bargained for.(n)

programme.title: Descent
programme.desc: A team of scientists are gathered to prevent a global catastrophe. But one of the scientists realizes early on that the cause of volcanic reactions is most likely due to a secret government operation investigating alternative energy resources.(n)

programme.title: Jack Hunter: And The Star of Heaven
programme.desc: Jack Hunter realizes the pharaoh's tomb being empty except for a Roman coin means the treasure was looted to Rome but later probably transferred the the new, Byzantine capital, Constantinople.(n)

programme.title: The Intergalactic Adventures of Max Cloud
programme.desc: When video-game enthusiast, Sarah is transported into her favorite game, she finds herself on an intergalactic prison, home to the most dangerous villains in the galaxy.(n)

programme.title: It's Christmas Carol!
programme.desc: Inspired by the Charles Dickens classic A Christmas Carol, It’s Christmas Carol! tells the story of a driven,\n heartless, publishing executive, Carol Huffman, who on Christmas Eve is visited by the ghost of her\n former boss, Eve.(n)

programme.title: Guess Who’s Coming to Christmas Dinner?
programme.desc: Law student Maya brings her new boyfriend home for the holidays, neglecting to tell her family that he's - well - white. Maya has one week to persuade her family that this is true love, will she be able to pull off this Christmas miracle?(n)

programme.title: Christmas For Three
programme.desc: When a successful bachelor suddenly finds himself as the guardian of a 10 year old boy, he leans on the smart and beautiful social worker for help, only to fall in love with the woman who turned his life upside down.(n)

programme.title: Christmas Wish
programme.desc: When Paula chose Gary over Nick, 15 years later she’d be married, with tons of debt. At Christmas, when Nick reappears, now a rich, successful art broker. A little Christmas magic and she is transported to the life with Nick.(n)

programme.title: Mary Higgins Clark
programme.sub-title: Mary Higgins Clark: We'll Meet Again
programme.desc: Socialite Molly is released from prison after serving a 6-year sentence for the murder of her husband and sets out to prove her innocence with the help of Fran, an investigative reporter who uncovers a conspiracy of silence and a shocking secret.(n)

programme.title: Clover Bend
programme.desc: An LA cop whose wife is killed in a shootout moves back to his hometown, trying to rebuild a life for himself and his children. Unbeknownst to him, his wife's killers are seeking revenge for one of their own who was also killed in the shootout.(n)

programme.title: A Deadly Affair
programme.desc: Suspecting her husband of having an affair, a woman trails him to the house he's been renovating only to discover that he's dead. As the investigation unfolds, things are not what they seem.(n)

programme.title: Wish You Were Dead
programme.desc: Hayley tries to make ends meet for herself and her daughter while providing alimony for an ex-husband. She wishes her problems with her ex could go away.(n)

programme.title: The Bleeder
programme.desc: Liquor salesman and part-time prizefighter Chuck Wepner gets the chance to take on Muhammad Ali in a highly publicized title fight, launching him to sudden fame.(n)

programme.title: Americano
programme.desc: When a gang of bully birds threaten his father and take over their circus, Cuco the parrot heads to Hollywood to ask TV superhero El Americano for help.(n)

programme.title: The Adventures of the Wilderness Family
programme.desc: A Los Angeles construction worker (Robert F. Logan) moves his wife (Susan Damante Shaw), son and asthmatic daughter (Hollye Holmes) to the Rockies.(n)

programme.title: Prince Valiant
programme.desc: A heroic squire (Stephen Moyer) protects a princess (Katherine Heigl) and tries to retrieve the sword Excalibur from Viking raiders.(n)

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: The adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their ranch while helping the surrounding community.(n)

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: Hoss helps ex army scout Charlie Trent (the towns drunk) regain his self-esteem, by volunteering him to lead Captain Pender's men across the desert with a valuable shipment.(n)

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: Joe's friend Dolly Kincaid defies her lawman father and runs off with a handsome stranger who is actually a bank robber.(n)

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: Hoss befriends a violent man after Adam and Little Joe warned him to stay away.(n)

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: Adam tries to prove to Hoss his love interest is a Gambler only interested in his money.(n)

programme.title: Black or White
programme.desc: A heart-wrenching drama starring Academy Award Winners Octavia Spencer and Kevin Costner. When Elliot is left to care for his granddaughter Eloise by himself, Eloise’s paternal grandmother seeks custody, drawing them into a long and uncertain battle.(n)

programme.title: Mumbo Jumbo
programme.desc: Thomas Doubting stumbles upon a magical amulet which takes him on a mysterious journey to the island of Sinmouth. The locals believe he is 'Mumbo Jumbo' – an entity who will restore their fortunes and rescue the beautiful Princess Vanilla.(n)

programme.title: The Secret Garden
programme.desc: Experience the magical world of 'The Secret Garden' as never before in this beautiful production of the classic tale. When her parents are lost in a tragic accident, Mary must seek comfort in the strange and forgotten corridors of Misselthwaite Factory.(n)

programme.title: Whip It
programme.desc: In Bodeen, Texas, an indie-rock loving misfit finds a way of dealing with her small-town misery after she discovers a roller derby league in nearby Austin.(n)

programme.title: Playing for Keeps
programme.desc: George is a retired soccer pro whose glory days are behind him. Burnt out on his playboy lifestyle and bankrupted by a string of bad investments, he moves back to Virginia to reconnect with his estranged ex-wife and neglected son.(n)

programme.title: Funny Money
programme.desc: When Henry Perkins accidentally trades his briefcase with a man, he finds five million dollars inside. However, the cash draws in Mr. Big, who wants to reclaim his money.(n)

programme.title: Circus of Horrors
programme.desc: Tale about a renegade plastic surgeon on the run from the police, who becomes the owner of a run-down circus. Before long, the performers experience a series of horrific accidents.(n)

programme.title: Night of the Eagle
programme.desc: A sceptical college professor learns the true power of the occult when he attempts to rescue his wife from Satanists.(n)

programme.title: The House in Nightmare Park
programme.desc: A struggling actor is invited to a large country home to perform a dramatic reading. Outwardly, the host is complimentary and enthusiastic, but his more sinister intentions are eventually made clear.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) leaps into the life of a 1962 teen-age football star who desperately tries to prevent a teammate (Richard Coca) from throwing the big game. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) becomes an FBI agent who is assigned to guard a woman (Teri Austin) targeted for assassination by her drug-dealing ex-boss. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) leaps into the life of a young American Indian in 1970, outrunning the law to let his ailing grandfather (Frank Sotonoma ``Gray Wolf'' Salsedo) die with dignity. Also guest stars Gloria Hayes.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) becomes a mortician in 1958 who is strangely obsessed with the suicide of a teen-age German girl. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) leaps into the life of an aging pool shark in 1954, faced with the match of his lifetime. Shari Headley guest stars. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Cell Game (REDUX)
programme.desc: When Dante loses Percy to corrupt Oberon police, he must work out a dangerous deal to free Percy, while she fights for her life in prison.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Blacklight (REDUX)
programme.desc: A cryogenic chamber in an abandoned section of the Tulip is accidentally powered up, and the legendary Colonel Bramwell emerges from a 50-year sleep.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Goodbye So Long (REDUX)
programme.desc: Soon after Dante reconnects with an old friend, he appears to be killed in an accident.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: The Most Wanted Man (REDUX)
programme.desc: The crew hunt a man whom everyone wants to capture, a man with the longest criminal record they've ever seen, and special powers that allow him to escape again and again.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: The Half dense Players (REDUX)
programme.desc: Dante is assigned to take custody of an unusual murder suspect, a beautiful artist plagued by strange visions that may threaten reality itself.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: A Dark and Stormy Night (REDUX)
programme.desc: Darius reconciles with Luc, while making peace with Dante, but the sinister forces that follow him are not far behind.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Auction Hunters, Ink.
programme.desc: Autographed 1960s Bob Shaw Swing Gate tattoo machine; Terry Ives competition 22hp chainsaw; six foot chainsaw-carved cedar bear.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Ice, Ice, Baby
programme.desc: Ton and Allen have to get aggressive when they encounter a towering opponent with a mountain of cash. The guys uncover a vintage ice resurfacing machine and an Olympic biathlon rifle!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Chicago Grand Slam
programme.desc: 1984 Yamaha SS440 Snowmobile that introduced the revolutionary shock absorber suspension; rare autographed 1920s baseball glove; mint Hank Aaron signed baseball; authentic 1950s Robby the Robot collector toy.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Battle Bought
programme.desc: Mint 1800s French "Harmonica Pistol" and a collection of '90s remote controlled combat robots.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Shuffle
programme.desc: Ton and Allen teach a cocky new auction hunter a lesson. They spot a 1940's-era shuffleboard table and uncover an early hot rod made from the fuel tank of a WWII fighter plane!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Wild West
programme.desc: Allen and Ton explain their strategies at a storage auction in San Bernardino, win two units, then have a Pepperbox gun and vintage Lionel train set appraised by experts.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Early Bird Special
programme.desc: Vintage Shooting Star carnival game; professional Mixed Martial Arts octagon fighting cage.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Smoking Ton
programme.desc: WW2 Stuart M3 tank barrel and heavy duty tank treads; rare, collectors' 1890 silver inlayed humidor; high-end industrial meat slicer in the ultimate restaurant unit.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: High Flying Ton
programme.desc: A nerdy auction buyer tests Ton and Allen's patience at a big container auction in Ventura. The guys discover a basket and burners for a hot air balloon and a 19th century German single shot rifle!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Home on the Gun Range
programme.desc: Barely making it to an auction in Corona, CA, Allen and Ton buy an overstuffed unit and find an antique crossbow, a rare 10-gauge Winchester shotgun and a 1940s Kiss-o-Meter.(n)
